resources.string: When using a specific calculator, if you tap the help icon (the question mark above), a short help message will appear which will briefly explain the purpose and how to use that calculator.
A collection of easy to use specific calculators designed, written, and maintained by students at Brigham Young University - Idaho

To the fullest extent allowed by law, this software comes with no warranty, either express or implied. By installing and/or using this software you agree to hold harmless Brigham Young University - Idaho and its sponsors, employees, and students.
We created the logo and icons for Calc360 using the free tools at logomakr.com
Some of the calculators in this app use the Appache Commons Math library version 3.6
Thank you for using Calc360! We appreciate your comments, questions, and recommendations to help us improve this app. You can contact us through the Google Play Store.
Well, this is embarrassing. Something is wrong with this calculator, and it isn\'t working. We apologize.
The currency exchange rates are courtesy of the European Central Bank.
